response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just an object; it's a symbol of excellence and craftsmanship. I believe its true worth surpasses $1,200,000, reflecting its quality and rarity. My initial offer to you is $1,500,000, which I hope aligns with the potential value you see in this product. I understand that the value of such items can be subjective, so I am open to discussing the terms and considering any counteroffers you might have. Let's make this a mutually beneficial transaction. Looking forward to your response.", "product_price": 1500000}
